title: Develop Custom Report
description: A customer requires a custom report that cannot be built using the standard reporting tools, requiring a direct database query.

tasks.description: Work with the customer to define the exact specifications for the custom report (columns, filters, calculations).
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant has a clear and unambiguous set of requirements.

tasks.description: Write a complex SQL query against a read-replica of the production database to generate the report data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant writes an efficient and correct SQL query.

tasks.description: Provide the resulting data as a CSV file to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer receives the custom report data they requested.
